alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 1:09PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Box Elder County through 145 PM MDT... At 109 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Park Valley, or 39 miles southeast of Oakley Reservoir, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Valley and Rosette. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 33 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
